## Refactoring Checklist

- [ ] No business logic changes (pure maintenance)
- [ ] JSDoc added to new functions
- [ ] Variable names are semantic (no `temp`, `val`, `data`)
- [ ] File lines < 300 (or modularized with index.ts)
- [ ] Build passes (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Lint passes (`npm run lint`)

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Refactoring
- [ ] Feature (requires architectural review)
